name: ORC-mkV Core Violet
description:
Item Type: Medium Armor
Damage Reduction: 30%
Carrying Capacity: 8K SP
Temp. Rating: -55 / 85 °C
Dependable and durable armor never goes out of style. The ORC-mkV from Clark Defense Systems has been a battlefield staple for centuries. This highly regarded medium armor blends composite plating with a special fiber reinforced polymer to provide solid protection and a wide range of movement.
description_cn:
物品类型：中型护甲
伤害减免：30%
可携带空间：8K SP
适用温度：-55 / 85 °C
可靠耐用的装甲永不过时.几个世纪以来,卡拉克防御系统的ORC-mkV一直是战场上的中坚力量.这种备受推崇的中型装甲将复合镀层与特殊增强纤维聚合物结合在一起,可提供坚固的保护和宽阔的活动范围.

shop_buy.layout_name_cn: 斯坦顿(Stanton)-微科星(microTech)-特雷斯勒太空站-FPSArmor
